comment:
* A {@link TapAction} represents an action which can be taken by a user by tapping on
 * either the title, the subtitle or on the icon. Supported instances are Intents and
 * PendingIntents. These actions can be called from another process or within the client process.
 *
 * Clients can also receive ShorcutInfos in the extras bundle.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mId
variables.comment: A unique Id of this {@link TapAction}.

variables.name: mShouldShowOnLockscreen
variables.comment:
* Whether the tap action's result should be shown on the lockscreen (e.g. turn off the
     * flashlight can be done on LS bypassing the keyguard). Default value is false.

methods.name: public CharSequence getId()
methods.comment: Returns the unique id of the tap action.

methods.name: public Intent getIntent()
methods.comment: Returns the intent of the tap action.

methods.name: public PendingIntent getPendingIntent()
methods.comment: Returns the pending intent of the tap action.

methods.name: public UserHandle getUserHandle()
methods.comment: Returns the user handle of the tap action.

methods.name: public Bundle getExtras()
methods.comment: Returns the extras bundle of the tap action.

methods.name: public boolean shouldShowOnLockscreen()
methods.comment:
* Whether the tap action's result should be shown on the lockscreen. If true, the tap action's
     * handling should bypass the keyguard. Default value is false.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)
